preface.title: Preface
preface.para: Welcome to the guide for PublicanCreators. In this documentation you will find how to get, setup and use PublicanCreators.
This guide does not contain a guide for Publican itself. For using that please look at this link. For reference how DocBook5 works you can follow this link.

PublicanCreators was launched because to help people who working daily with Publican and DocBook in different formats and environments. So i would like to thank the Publican people for building this great tool. Also i'm thanking the Ruby guys in special the Nokogiri and Parseconfig teams. A special thank goes to the guys on stackoverflow who helped me a lot of times.
